Verify the primary 'Submit' button is enabled, has fill color #007bff, text color #ffffff, text size 16px, inner spacing 10px 20px, corner curvature 4px, and width 120px
Confirm the 'Username' input field shows hint text 'Enter your username', width 200px, height 40px, and 1px solid border of color #cccccc
Confirm the 'Username' input field becomes in focus with a 2px solid border of #007bff upon interaction
Check the hero product image has source URL 'product_main.jpg', loads under 500ms, intrinsic size 800x600px, displayed size 400x300px, and alt text 'High-quality product image'
Ensure the video player is displayed, occupies dimensions 640px wide by 360px high, and is muted by default
Ensure the video player transitions to fullscreen mode with an animation duration of 300ms when activated
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link is visible, has text 'About Us', color #333333, and type weight 500
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link changes its backdrop color to #f0f0f0 with a 200ms transition on hover
Confirm the error message 'Invalid credentials.' appears below the input, has color #dc3545, text size 14px, outer spacing top 8px, and is concealed after 5s
Check the shopping cart icon exhibits a count of 3 items, has aria-label 'Shopping Cart with 3 items', and is positioned at x-coordinate 90% viewport width and y-coordinate 20px
Verify the 'Confirm Deletion' modal dialog is centered on the screen at x=50% and y=50%, has width 400px, overlay background color rgba(0,0,0,0.8), and opacity 1 after a 300ms transition
Ensure the first table row (item 'Apple') has background color #f8f8f8, text color #333333, font family 'Arial', text size 14px, and 12px padding for its content cells
Scroll down 200px
Verify the fixed header remains at top 0px, width 100%, and its background color shifts from transparent to #ffffff with a 400ms transition
Confirm the 'Remember me' checkbox is unchecked by default and its associated label 'Remember me' is positioned to its right
Confirm the 'Remember me' checkbox becomes selected with a border color #007bff when clicked
Verify the date input field holds a current entry of '2023-10-27', is active, and its calendar pop-up appears at y-coordinate 100px below the input, showing the current month and year
Check the progress bar has a filled section width of 75%, fill color #28a745, height 8px, and corner curvature 4px at both ends
Confirm the user avatar image has source URL 'avatar.png', is circular with border radius 50%, displayed dimensions 48x48px, and 2px solid border of #ffffff
Verify the 'Help' icon's tooltip appears on hover with content 'Click for assistance', backdrop color #333333, text color #ffffff, text size 12px, and outer spacing top 8px from the icon
Check the product description text is left-aligned, uses font family 'Open Sans', text size 15px, color #666666, and occupies a container with width 700px
Ensure the 'Download Report' link has text 'Download Report', source URL 'https://example.com/report.pdf', type weight 600, and an underline when not in focus
Ensure the 'Download Report' link changes to color #0056b3 when active
Verify the quantity input field has a default current entry of 1 and is 60px wide
Verify the increment/decrement buttons are visible with text size 20px and background color #e9ecef
Confirm the ad banner is displayed, positioned at bottom 0px and right 0px, has width 300px, height 250px, and shows a watermark 'AD' with opacity 0.7 at its top-left corner
Check the search results list displays 10 items, each with text label 'Search Result N', outer spacing top 10px, and bottom border 1px solid #eeeeee
